General.Name: Pharmocann Global Ltd
General.Description: Pharmocann Global Ltd engages in the multiplication, cultivation, production, and sale of cannabis for medical purposes. It provides cannabis to treat patients with depression, post-trauma, anxiety disorders, and obsessive-compulsive disorder. The company produces 4 tons of processed cannabis. It operates in Israel, Australia, Asia, Europe, the United States, and Canada. It also produces and distributes hemp based cosmetic and seed oil products. The company was formerly known as Medical Compression System (DBN) Ltd. Pharmocann Global Ltd was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Kiryat Tivon, Israel.
